```
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: random-generator
spec:
  completions: 5                 ![1](assets/1.png)
  parallelism: 2                 ![2](assets/2.png)
  ttlSecondsAfterFinished: 300   ![3](assets/3.png)
  template:
    metadata:
      name: random-generator
    spec:
      restartPolicy: OnFailure   ![4](assets/4.png)
      containers:
      - image: k8spatterns/random-generator:1.0
        name: random-generator
        command: [ "java", "RandomRunner", "/numbers.txt", "10000" ]
```

```
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: file-split
spec:
  completionMode: Indexed     ![1](assets/1.png)
  completions: 5              ![2](assets/2.png)
  parallelism: 5
  template:
    metadata:
      name: file-split
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: alpine
        name: split
        command:              ![3](assets/3.png)
        - "sh"
        - "-c"
        - |
          start=$(expr $JOB_COMPLETION_INDEX \* 10000) ![4](assets/4.png)
          end=$(expr $JOB_COMPLETION_INDEX \* 10000 + 10000)
          awk "NR>=$start && NR<$end" /logs/random.log \ ![5](assets/5.png)
              > /logs/random-$JOB_COMPLETION_INDEX.txt
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /logs    ![6](assets/6.png)
          name: log-volume
      restartPolicy: OnFailure
```
